trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: BookmarkReachedEventArgs példánya létrejön, amikor a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objektum vet fel a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>vet fel a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>eseményt, amikor könyvjelző feldolgozásakor bármelyike ütközik a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, vagy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Nevét és helyét a könyvjelző az eseményt kiváltó beszerzéséhez hozzáférni a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>és a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>a kezelő az esemény tulajdonságai.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a könyvjelző elérte a időeltolódás.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti hangadatfolyam összefoglaló motor a helyét adja meg, ha az esemény időpontja.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi, hogy a rendszer elérte a könyvjelző nevét.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: A könyvjelző nevét egy értékét adja vissza.
